title: Cleaners : Les experts du m√©nage
overview: In everyday life, they are bloggers, cooks or entrepreneurs. But in truth they have a double life: they are the household experts. Depending on the distress encountered, our 4 experts will decide which of them is the most competent to help but also to teach the right gestures. The cleaners only have 3 days to put everything away and clean everything from floor to ceiling! Thanks to a lot of courage and many tricks that they will teach, they will obtain a result that is always spectacular! These 3 days will bring a profound change in the behavior but also the daily life of the witnesses who will call on the cleaners.
